title: People! It turns out capitalism is actually a thing!
summary:
Key ideas
- Reddit users often recommend Amazon Prime as a great purchase.
- The author used to struggle with choosing products with his old algorithm.
- The author's new algorithm is to search for a five-star rated, cheap product recommended by a person with similar preferences. 

Key learnings
- Amazon Prime is a great purchase.
- Searching for a five-star rated, cheap product with good customer reviews works better than traditional methods. 

Key questions
- What is the author's old algorithm for choosing products?
- Why does the new algorithm work better than the old one?
- What surprising things has the author bought using the new algorithm?
